Instruction: 'Wash and dice potatoes into bite-sized pieces.'
In a large bowl, toss potatoes with olive oil, garlic powder, dried thyme, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper until evenly coated.'
'Spread potatoes in a single layer on a baking sheet.'
Bake for 30-35 minutes, or until potatoes are golden brown and crispy, flipping halfway through cooking.'
